biotools.summary: The ctDNAtools R package provides functionalities to analyze circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA)/ cell-free DNA (cfDNA) sequencing data. The tools cover analysis of ctDNA/cfDNA fragmentation and analysis of cancer minimal residual disease.

bioschemas.name: ctDNAtools
